name: The Viridescent Hunt
desc: A pure green hunting bow. This once belonged to a certain hunter whose home was the forest.

values.desc: Upon hit, Normal and Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to generate a Cyclone, which will continuously attract surrounding opponents, dealing <color=#99FFFFFF>40%</color> of ATK as DMG to these opponents every 0.5s for 4s. This effect can only occur once every <color=#99FFFFFF>14</color>s.

Upon hit, Normal and Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to generate a Cyclone, which will continuously attract surrounding opponents, dealing <color=#99FFFFFF>50%</color> of ATK as DMG to these opponents every 0.5s for 4s. This effect can only occur once every <color=#99FFFFFF>13</color>s.

Upon hit, Normal and Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to generate a Cyclone, which will continuously attract surrounding opponents, dealing <color=#99FFFFFF>60%</color> of ATK as DMG to these opponents every 0.5s for 4s. This effect can only occur once every <color=#99FFFFFF>12</color>s.

Upon hit, Normal and Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to generate a Cyclone, which will continuously attract surrounding opponents, dealing <color=#99FFFFFF>70%</color> of ATK as DMG to these opponents every 0.5s for 4s. This effect can only occur once every <color=#99FFFFFF>11</color>s.

Upon hit, Normal and Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to generate a Cyclone, which will continuously attract surrounding opponents, dealing <color=#99FFFFFF>80%</color> of ATK as DMG to these opponents every 0.5s for 4s. This effect can only occur once every <color=#99FFFFFF>10</color>s.
